title: Hammock, 20th century
medium:
Medium: raffia, wood
Technique: non-woven, braiding and twining
description: A non-woven form: length of 3 strand braided raffia looped through holes in wooden stretchers at both ends. One set of elements, the braided raffia or warp, interacted or held in place by 2-strand weft-twining every 8". Each twined raffia band has one green weft. Wooden stick inserted in warp loops at both ends (one milling) with the free end of warp at both ends pulled through warp-loops and tied (one broken). (MS'72)

tombstone.epitaph:
Hammock, 20th century. Medium: raffia, wood
Technique: non-woven, braiding and twining. 1972-28-2.
